records.KccAns: spray 350-400ml trizophos 40ec in 100 liters water/acre for the control of caterpillar in maize.

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE SUITABLE VARIETIES OF PADDY(JHONA) ?

records.KccAns: VARIETY OF ARHAR= PUSA 991, PUSA 2011, PUSA 2002
Glyphosate 41% Sl 3-4 lit./ hec. 500 lit. panee me milaker spray kare

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE FERT. DOSE AT THE TIME OF PADDY(JHONA) TRANSPLANTING?
records.KccAns: THE FERT. DOSE AT THE TIME OF PADDY(JHONA) TRANSPLANTING-F.Y.M.-250Q.,DAP-45KG,MOP-20KG & UREA-110KG(AS TOP DRESSING-.3 TIME) & 25 KG ZINC SULPHATE 21% PER ACRE.

records.QueryText: information regarding for weeds control in maize crops?
records.KccAns: spray with atrazin@200gm/60 liter of water/bigha for weeds control in maize crops.

records.QueryText: baigan me keet lag raha hai

records.KccAns: imidacloprid 15 ml + bavistin 20 gm /15 ltr water

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE CONTROL OF FRUIT BORER IN OKRA(BHINDI) CROP?
records.KccAns: FOR THE CONTROL OF FRUIT BORER IN OKRA(BHINDI) CROP,PLS SPRAY 250ML DELTAMETHRIN  IN 150LITRE WATER/ACRE.

records.QueryText: Information regarding how to control weeds in cotton?
records.KccAns: Spray 800 ml. traiflon in 150 lt. of water per acre.

Growth regulators          
NAA @ 20 ppm is sprayed at flowering to increase the fruit retention.  During February 0.5% Urea (5 g/lit.) or 1% Potassium Nitrate (10g/lit.) may be sprayed to induce flowering, if trees do not flower by that time. Spraying of 2% KNO3 at mustard size will increase the fruit set and retention of fruits.

Overcast, thunderstorms with rain
Precip chance: 66%
Humidity: 93%

records.QueryText: how to prepare nursery of cauliflower ?
records.KccAns: 100 sq. m nursery area is sufficient for raising one hectare. Apply FYM at 300 kg and 10 kg of No.5 mixture (9:9:9) along with 50 g of Sodium molybdate and 100 g of Borax. Sow the seeds at 10 cm between rows in raised seed beds after drenching it with Copper oxychloride (2.5 g/lit). Transplant 30 to 40 days old seedlings at a spacing of 45 cm. Avoid land infected with ?club root disease?.
